answers.answer: I'm only 7weeks and I been craving fruits and last night I was craving lasagna
I've been craving pizzw and chicken nuggets.
8 weeks and it's all about apples for me.
8 weeks and I crave sour candy and string cheese.
No specific cravings just starving all the time
No specific cravings just starving all the time
I been craving italian beef, had to stop at beef villa yesterday n today, n im always hungry, n yellow apples
Pizza and salads with sunflower seeds on it..cheese too
6W5d and wingettes is what i crave and cranberry apple juice
7 weeks I crave chili from steak n shake and eggs with toast and peachs and salad. That's about it.

I am also 8w3d and I'm having cravings.  I am craving onions... Like, onion rings are my new favorite thing.  Also, the other day I finally got THE LOOK from my husband.  I made a plate that had sweet pickles and grapes, and I washed it down with a big glass of chocolate milk.  He thought I was nuts, but it seemed like a perfectly normal snack to me at the time.
Sriracha!!!! Can't get enough of it, I put it on pretty much everything. Never cared for it before now.
Pickles! But only baby dill!!! Lol

Many things. Cheese almost  always! Chicken wings Wednesday, chocolate milk yesterday, today pancakes.. Lol things I never usually eat! But I couldn't stop thinking of them till I had them Lol I'm 9 weeks 4 days.

I don't usually have the apetite to eat normally.. I am 9 weeks and 2 days btw. But when I do crave something, I can't stop thinking about it until I had it! The stuff that I usually don't like appeals to me a lot now. Lol. Yesterday, I craved for pad thai noodles and I had it for lunch today and it tasted/ felt like heaven! :) Now, I am thinking of sweet potato fries but I might have to wait until tomorrow. Most of the places that sell them are closed now. Anyhow, I'm wishing everyone a happy and healthy pregnancy! :)
The other day I was craving tacos. But not just any tacos, they had to be taco bell. I. craved them so bad I could smell them. It was crazy.

Im 8 weeks and 5days and ive been craving onions and green peppers on potatoes and eggs with chocolate ice cream on the side!! This is my 5th pregnancy i lost one at 28 weeks 2 years ago im so scared  none of them were ever this smooth im usually on bedrest with preeclampsia at this point. Im just praying for a healthy full term baby which ive never had

question: I'm 8w3d and I am already having cravings. Not anything crazy but cravings. I didn't have any of this with my first pregnancy. Is anyone else having cravings already and what are they?
title: Cravings??
